name: Hour of Code, 2014
body: ## Welcome to Hour of Code ## Tutorials Note: For those without a laptop, we have an "unplugged" series of tutorials for you ### Online tutorials Open up browser and go to: [`code.org`](http://code.org/) Then click orange 'Start' button. The page is organized with the most popular ones at the top. We suggest starting with either Angry Birds or Frozen. If you want to type code from a real-world programming language, give Python or Javascript try: ## After finishing your first tutorial We're guessing you'll love the first tutorial so much you'll want to try another! Feel free to stick around to try another tutorial on that page. You can also click on the "Beyond One Hour" tab, where you'll find even more tutorials, like how to make games and web pages, program robots, or even university-level courses. Before you head out, come to us so we can hand you your Certificate of Completion!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
